name: Weird Hero
description: Weird Hero is a humorous and challenging shoot'em up where the hero, SuperMegaDude, battles countless foes with his arsenal of weird weapons: the Flickinator, the Atomic Toaster, a magician's hat and other strange devices.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8.1,10 Processor: 1600 MHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 720m DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
